name: Logoog
description:
Logoog is a simple game about optimal stopping. You are given 20 random numbers in order, and once you pass one of them, you can't go back to it. Your goal is to choose the largest number. Unfamiliar with optimal stopping? Check out the following video to learn more about it!

If you want to let me know anything regarding the game, tweet at me @ConradicalGames!
